description: Scientists, industrialists, and researchers who study Obscuria's mysteries for profit and progress. Monsterology captures specimens, harvests Thyr, and experiments with forbidden technologies.
weapons_note: Unit costs include standard-issue weapons. Weapon abilities and properties are defined in core rules. Upgradeable weapons and devices have additional point costs listed in optional_upgrades.

faction_features.name: Monster Hunters
faction_features.effect: Monsterology units can kill Monsters to research their mort (flesh, blood, and bone). Mort removed from the table scores VP.

faction_features.name: Thyr Exploitation
faction_features.effect: Monsterology prioritizes harvesting Thyr crystals for industrial use.

units.name: Squab
units.lore: Disposable wannabe Plugs, shifty booze cultists, and debt prisoners armed with trash and desperation. Squab are chemically compromised and barely coherent.
units.tactics: Objective cloggers, panic spreaders, and mobile hazards. Squab die easily, but can disrupt morale, terrain, and positioning.

optional_upgrades.name: Rotgut Drunk
optional_upgrades.effect: Gain fearless. This model ignores Fear, Terror, and Dread. However, if this model rolls a Critical Failure (all 1s) on any Quality roll, it gains random_movement for the rest of the game.

optional_upgrades.name: Improvised Bomb
optional_upgrades.effect: Gain blast. When this model is destroyed, resolve a 3" Blast attack centered on it. This attack ignores Cover.

optional_upgrades.name: Fake Hat
optional_upgrades.effect: Deploy this model using a Plugugly miniature instead of a Squab. While undiscovered, enemies must treat it as a Plugugly for targeting and threat evaluation. The disguise is revealed when: (1) this model takes damage, (2) this model performs an Attack, or (3) this model fails a Morale test. Once revealed, replace with a Squab model immediately.

units.name: Chemist Lackey
units.lore: Lab assistants equipped with unstable chemical sprayers, monster pheromones, and sealed breathing rigs. Chemist Lackeys reshape the battlefield through gas, toxins, and behavioral manipulation.
units.tactics: Board control specialists. Use smoke to block clarity, split formations, and enable monster traps. Supports Scientists and ritual units while denying space to the enemy.

optional_upgrades.name: Monster Lures
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game, throw 12". Monsters within 6" must test Morale or move toward it.

optional_upgrades.name: Mustard Gas
optional_upgrades.effect: When this model uses smoke_screen, the terrain created is also Hazardous. In addition, enemies activating within this Choking terrain roll -1 die on Morale tests.

optional_upgrades.name: Binding Salts
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game, create a 3" barrier monsters cannot cross for 2 rounds.

units.name: Devourer Adept
units.lore: High priest cultists who harvest Mort and Thyr for the Feast Bishop. They oversee sacrificial logistics, seed Haunts, and conduct the Great Workings.
units.tactics: Ritual engine and VP generator. Use Devourer Adepts to collect Mort, deliver it to the Feast Bishop, and corrupt terrain through sustained sacrifice.

supplemental_abilities.name: Wheelbarrow Cultist
supplemental_abilities.effect: Lose abilities: ritual and taint_ground. Reduce Move by -1. Gain: Unholy Wheelbarrow (may carry up to 3 Mort/Thyr tokens), Bone Rosary (once per round, when this model would lose 1 Quality, roll 1d6; on a 5+ ignore the damage), and Gas Mask (immune to Choking and gas effects).

optional_upgrades.name: Doom Turnip
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game. Plant a cursed ritual turnip in Tainted or Haunted terrain within 3". At the end of the round, a Haunt is spawned adjacent and all units within 3" suffer 1 automatic damage.

optional_upgrades.name: Chalice of Bile
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game. Spend 1 Mort token. All friendly Monsterology units within 6" gain Regeneration until the end of the round.

optional_upgrades.name: Sacrificial Overload
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game. Spend 1 Mort and 1 Thyr crystal. Ignore all Fallout and Backlash this round. The terrain within 3" becomes Hazardous and Haunted.

optional_upgrades.name: Bone Rosary
optional_upgrades.effect: Passive. Once per round, when this model would lose 1 Quality, roll 1d6. On a 5+, ignore the damage.

optional_upgrades.name: Gas Mask
optional_upgrades.effect: Passive. This unit ignores Coffin Cough, Choking Dust, and other environmental gas or smoke effects.

units.name: Plugugly
units.lore: Chemically enhanced shock troops addicted to Sonderbar.

units.name: Scientist
units.tactics: Support unit enabling injections and Electromagik.

optional_upgrades.name: Powder Monkey
optional_upgrades.effect: Reroll one failed shot per turn.
